actions.description: The agent moves up by 1 cell, decreasing the x coordinate by 1.
The agent moves down by 1 cell, increasing the x coordinate by 1.
The agent moves left by 1 cell, decreasing the y coordinate by 1.
The agent moves right by 1 cell, increasing the y coordinate by 1.
The agent picks up all the parcels on the ground. The agent has to be in the same cell of the parcels to pick them up.
The agent puts down all the parcels it is carrying on the ground. The agent will put down the parcels in the cell it is currently in.
